headline: Why Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of power management chips maker Monolithic Power Systems (NASDAQ:MPWR) jumped 5.7% in the afternoon session after a broad rally in the semiconductor sector lifted shares as industry bellwether ASML reported strong earnings and a positive outlook.

headline: Nvidia AI Partner Breaks Out, Boosted By Big Demand
summary: As Nvidia works on a new setup, solid growth and strong demand for AI data centers puts Monolithic Power in buy range.

headline: PTAB Patent Setback For Monolithic Power Systems And Valuation Questions
summary: The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office's Patent Trial and Appeal Board ruled all challenged claims of Monolithic Power Systems' U.S. Patent No. 9,041,377 B2 unpatentable. The ruling came in a legal proceeding initiated by Reed Semiconductor Corp. The decision affects a patent tied to Monolithic Power Systems' intellectual property portfolio and may influence future competitive dynamics. For investors watching Monolithic Power Systems, ticker NasdaqGS:MPWR, this patent ruling lands at a time...
